Dec. 6, 1981 D Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest (Section B)
Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest (Section B) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest huddersfield-district-bba-december-conte-4824

Huddersfield Town Hall, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £40, 2nd £30, 3rd £20. 10 bands competed.
June 16, 2014, 1:59 p.m. June 25, 2016, 12:07 p.m.
